name: Christmas Run
description:
Made for LD 43

It's almost morning, and Santa has not delivered all of the presents yet! You can help him by deciding if accuracy is more important than his reindeer.

CONTROLS

Use mouse to move up and down.
Press E to sacrifice a reindeer.
Press space to drop a present.
If you miss a present you will lose and have to start over.
Avoid the birds!

The music is made by "greenRiverThriller". Here is his youtube channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGP4QIqC76qkIGmLiXS5O6A
